name: Hentai EroCum
description:
Hentai EroCum is a relaxing puzzle game.
With 6 different themes, 36 sexy girls and more then 80 beautiful and erotic images.
Enjoy charming girls pictures and relaxing music.
Complete a puzzle and then shake a photo to open much more explicit content.GameplaySwap puzzle pieces to complete levels and then shake a photo to open much more explicit content.
Unlock more locations, situations and beautiful girls. Watch the full pictures after completing the puzzle.
Features- Sexy girls pictures & Relaxing music
- Solve and shake system
- Gallery mode after completing a level
- Achievements are letters of the English alphabet and numbers - collect the word you want!
- "Enter" key to quickly complete the current level
- The price is only a dollar
